            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The purpose of the multi-year GWAS Water Monitoring Plan is to provide knowledge and a database of information about the health of the lotic aquatic systems within the Ghost Watershed. Monitoring changes over time is an important aspect of protecting a watershed. Monitoring of watershed health following the CABiN (Canadian Aquatic Biomonitoring Network) protocol is a recommendation in the Ghost River State of the Watershed Report (2018). The data collected will augment existing information and is intended to assist public land managers and other organizations tasked with water management responsibilities to better manage our water resources. It will also help GWAS identify high priority sites for future restoration and provide baseline data for future state of the watershed reporting.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

fr: Bassin versant de la rivière Ghost

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-qvna-zt90
notes: The purpose of the multi-year GWAS Water Monitoring Plan is to provide knowledge and a database of information about the health of the lotic aquatic systems within the Ghost Watershed. Monitoring changes over time is an important aspect of protecting a watershed. Monitoring of watershed health following the CABiN (Canadian Aquatic Biomonitoring Network) protocol is a recommendation in the Ghost River State of the Watershed Report (2018). The data collected will augment existing information and is intended to assist public land managers and other organizations tasked with water management responsibilities to better manage our water resources. It will also help GWAS identify high priority sites for future restoration and provide baseline data for future state of the watershed reporting.

notes_translated.en: The purpose of the multi-year GWAS Water Monitoring Plan is to provide knowledge and a database of information about the health of the lotic aquatic systems within the Ghost Watershed. Monitoring changes over time is an important aspect of protecting a watershed. Monitoring of watershed health following the CABiN (Canadian Aquatic Biomonitoring Network) protocol is a recommendation in the Ghost River State of the Watershed Report (2018). The data collected will augment existing information and is intended to assist public land managers and other organizations tasked with water management responsibilities to better manage our water resources. It will also help GWAS identify high priority sites for future restoration and provide baseline data for future state of the watershed reporting.
notes_translated.fr: L'objectif du plan pluriannuel de surveillance de l'eau de la GWAS est de fournir des connaissances et une base de données d'informations sur la santé des systèmes aquatiques lotiques du bassin versant Ghost. La surveillance des changements au fil du temps est un aspect important de la protection d'un bassin versant. La surveillance de la santé des bassins versants conformément au protocole CAbIN (Réseau canadien de biosurveillance aquatique) est une recommandation du rapport sur l'état du bassin versant de la rivière Ghost (2018). Les données collectées compléteront les informations existantes et visent à aider les gestionnaires des terres publiques et les autres organisations chargées de la gestion de l'eau à mieux gérer nos ressources en eau. Cela aidera également la GWAS à identifier les sites hautement prioritaires pour une restauration future et à fournir des données de base pour les rapports futurs sur l'état du bassin versant.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Ghost Watershed Water Quality Monitoring Program

title_translated.en: Ghost Watershed Water Quality Monitoring Program
title_translated.fr: Programme de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau du bassin versant Ghost

title_translation_method.fr: Title text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate
